title: What Our Users Say
subtitle: Users can sell your product better than you. Real feedback from developers who built amazing products with our template

testimonial1.name: Sarah Chen
testimonial1.content: This template saved me weeks of development time. The code quality is exceptional and the documentation is crystal clear.

testimonial2.name: Mike Johnson
testimonial2.content: We launched our SaaS product in just 2 weeks using this template. The built-in payment and auth systems work flawlessly.

testimonial3.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonial3.content: The component architecture is brilliant. Our team was able to customize everything without breaking the existing functionality.
